name: Aid childbirth
text: Labour becomes very easy and free of complications. No particular drawback. Very popular civilian magic. @Healing tribal@.

name: Aromakinesis
text: You can create, change, or cancel arbitrary smells nearby.

name: Attune red
text: Attune to red. @Facile.

name: Augment
text: You get +1 combat. Can be cast even while holding a weapon.

name: Cryokinesis
text: Slowly cool target object. Can get from room temperature to -40 degrees over 10 minutes.

name: Fertilise
text: Target plant grows 10% faster. @Persists:persistent@ for 24 hours.

name: Geokinesis
text: Shape crystalline (ie metal, rock, ceramic) matter. (This lacks precision: if you try it on organic, it ruptures cell walls and you get slush.) Effective in crafting, repairs, digging, and peeling through walls. Subject matter takes on consistency of wet clay, so you can't reshape diamond into carbon nanotubes.

name: Hydrokinesis
text: You gain telekinetic power over water nearby. +2* combat, +2 @ranged@. Take an additional +3 to all physical while in water, or +1 more combat if near enough water to swim in.

name: Inferno
text: Fires randomly break out all around you aeor. Determine the number and strength by (a POW roll vs 0)*. Take +6* and 2 -1 magic tokens. @Unbridled@.

name: Mouseform
text: -10 size. @Channelled@.

name: Musikinesis
text: Amplify any nearby sounds of your choice up to 100dB. Creates minor distortion. Can also save and repeat or loop sounds; these are too distorted to make out words, but rhythms and music are mostly intact.

name: Ogreform
text: +2 size, +1 combat, but can't use a weapon. @Channelled@.

name: Panikinesis
text: Kinesis over cloth. Has enough coordination to make fibres bind to each other and efficiently weave multiple strands together in parallel. Good for repairs, making cloth.

name: Photokinesis
text: You gain some control over light, including the ability to conjure glowing glass-like forcefields. +3* @armour@, +3* @ranged@, and gain a shield absorbing the next 2 focus you would lose (does not stack). Can conjure illumination of any colour.

name: Pyrokinesis
text: You gain fire control power, including the ability to conjure it. +2* combat, +3 @ranged@, @fiery@, and an additional +1 if there is a fire of POW at least 5 nearby. Create a fire with every clash, on your position if you lose, target if you win, with POW equal to your own. This can't put fires out.

name: Refine
text: Remove oxygen from minerals, viz for converting haematite to iron.

name: Soothe
text: Target with @Injury@ but no Soothe tokens removes 1 Injury and takes 5 Soothe. Soothe has "If you have no Injury, you may remove one of these per long rest." Take +1 to @medical@ checks. @Healing tribal@.

name: Sterilise
text: Kill bacteria, insect eggs, mould spores, viruses, or other tiny pests. Can be used prophylactically to prevent milk from souring, etc. Take +1 to @medical@ checks. @Healing tribal@.

name: Telekinesis
text: You gain some general but relatively weak telekinesis. +2 combat, +3 @ranged@. Can pick up, push, or pull items from long range. Force capped at 20% of your weight, so you can't fly, but can propel self for +5 to jumps.

name: Terminate pregnancy
text: Administer a magical abortion. Nausea is a common side effect. @Healing tribal@.

name: Transmute
text: Temporarily change the composition of crystalline matter. Maximum size is $level-5 fewer size levels; this lasts indefinitely, but if you try to transmute more, the first part reverts. Mass is conserved, not volume. At level 0, you can make base salts and materials (lead, table salt, copper); at level 1, can make iron, zinc, most ceramics, and can revert to original material; at level 2, can make diamond (it's not very valuable in-universe); at level 3, can make titanium. Can't make noble metals, radioactive materials, or manite ever.

name: Waterwalk
text: You and up to 0* allies can breathe underwater or can walk on water, your choice. Lasts 3* rounds, can be refreshed. If you choose walking while submerged, you are pushed toward the surface.

name: Antimagic shell
text: You have @nullify@ 5*. Anyone who casts at you takes -1 magic token aeor.

name: Appropriate
text: If a target casts a spell at you, +6*, and ueoc they lose access to that spell and you gain access to it.

name: Attune orange
text: Attune to orange. @Facile@.

name: Boost
text: Assist an ally's spellcasting, ie their casting attribute counts as min(attr, you.MAS)+5.

name: Copyrite
text: Copy a spell of level up to this.level that was cast last round, of any colour. This includes combat spells. You must pay any additional costs of that spell such as manite.

name: Disenchant
text: Break an enchantment of level equal or lower to [this plus 5]. Does not affect spells that are permanent without enchantment, such as curses.

name: Disjunction
text: Even the lightest touch cancels magic. +7* vs summons.

name: Enchant
text: The duration of some other spell of level<=this.level-5 becomes permanent. The spell isn't being cast, so it doesn't give combat bonuses; you can do things like eternal fire, bound summons, etc, but not a flamethrower. This can't make enchanted wearable gear. This requires manite; say, 5*(target.level) grams. If Enchant is used with Inscribe, the item has enchant.level charges, and can be recharged by use of this spell, without requiring manite.

name: Inscribe
text: Some other spell of level<=this.level-5 is inscribed onto a solid object, whence it can be 'cast' in response to a trigger, which is typically either reading a scroll or touching a glyph, customarily marked with a crossed circle. Lasts until used or until the glyph is erased. Requires target.level grams of manite.

name: Loan
text: Ueoc, one nearby ally gains access to one of your spells and you lose access to it. They use their own stats to cast it.

name: Meditate
text: Enter a magical combat trance and open your mind to higher states. +2* combat and take +1 magic aeor.

name: Proof
text: Magic can't affect whatever you touch while this is @channelled@, unless its level is at least 10 higher than this.level.

name: Siphon
text: +4*, and if you defeat anyone in a clash, they take 2 -1 magic tokens up to their modified magic stat, and you gain that many +1 magic tokens. You can only take tokens from one clash per round.

name: Spoof
text: Blue magic can't detect anything on your person, but is otherwise unaffected and receives no indication that it isn't working properly.

name: Antigrav
text: Negate the force of gravity on yourself and up to 0* allies or objects of equal or lesser size. Can use this for pseudo flight with an AGI+ath* check vs 10 to avoid crashing and taking 1 Injury.

name: Attune yellow
text: Attune to yellow. @Facile@.

name: Bubble
text: Cordon yourself and some nearby area into an ad hoc pocket dimension, such that nobody can enter or leave. There must be a keystone on the outside (ie the non-you side); if it is destroyed, or you are incapacitated, the spell fizzles.

name: Create pocket dimension
text: Create a small, short-lived extra dimension. Combined with enchanting to create a dimensional warehouse: you bind multiple dimensions to a manite layer, breach them, and you have a DW. Most also have control systems, using purple: if you don't, a thief can steal your cargo.

name: Create wormhole
text: Create a pocket dimension with two access points that can be moved freely.

name: Dimensional breach
text: Tunnel into an alternate dimension with similar world coordinates.

name: Flashstep
text: Instantly move up to 50m if you could walk there (you can walk past a guard, you can't walk over a wall). +2* combat, treat combat as pure melee. +5* to chase checks.

name: Gravity tilt
text: +5* to climb checks; everyone within melee engagement range of you has their base $fight capped at their $athletics.

name: Hammerspace
text: Access a pocket dimension that can fit up to -5* size categories of stuff. Its access point is locked to your position.

name: Shuffle
text: +10* ranged; on a hit, swap your position with the target's.

name: Solitude
text: Create a random maze of warped geometry nearby. Everything is still topologically connected, but characters become isolated from each other and lost. @Unbridled@.

name: Space warp
text: Change spatial geometry nearby. You can make something bigger on the inside than out, make areas closer or further.

name: Stasis
text: Time does not pass within a space equal to you.size*. @Channelled@ (or more usefully, enchanted).

name: Suspend
text: +2* combat, and on a hit, the target is sent 1 round into the future (in addition to any damage).

name: Attune blue
text: Attune to blue. @Facile@.

name: Biomancy
text: Diagnose infections, injuries, pregnancies, vitamin deficiencies, or other health issues. +1 to @medical@ checks. @Healing tribal@.

name: Chameleon
text: @Veil:veil@ yourself and up to 0* allies. It's a single veil, so you have to stay together, and if anyone does anything to blow it, it blows for all of you.

name: Clarity
text: +10* to spot @veils:veil@.

name: Disguise
text: Create a @veil@ on yourself that makes you look like someone else, if you successfully check MAS+stealth* vs MET+vig. To look like someone in particular, take -5. Getting touched breaks the veil, so suspicious people often ask to tap each other.

name: Encrypt
text: Hard-scramble information indefinitely, unless a passphrase or other slipknot is applied. This isn't a veil, it's obvious that information is there, it just can't be parsed, eg writing will be visible but rendered like lorem ipsum. Combined with DWs such that if you don't have the key, you absolutely can't get at the cargo, and if you just try to smash the door, it'll collapse the dimension and you'll never get the cargo. Encryption can be disenchanted; but it's often combined with other enchantments, such that if you break the encryption, you'll destroy the entire item anyway.

name: Eyebite
text: Take +1*, and if you would inflict N damage, instead inflict @Dazzle@ N.

name: Facade
text: Create a static visual @veil@ of up to 2*m squared. Its texture behaves like an object in your blind spot, eg if you put a facade over a small hole in a wall, it will look like the rest of the wall.

name: Geomancy
text: Identify composition of crystals.

name: Haze
text: Obscure an area of up to 5m cubed, looking like smoke. Anything inside counts as hidden.

name: Kaleidomancy
text: The area is bathed in sensory chaos: glittering lights, musical bells, strange smells. For all actions, everyone's base skill is capped at $vigilance. This does not need to be channelled.

name: Meteomancy
text: Predict the weather, 3* days into the future within 1*km.

name: Necromancy
text: Speak with the dead. Each unique caster may speak with each corpse for up to 1* minute. The corpse may or may not be cooperative, but they tend to be amenable to getting revenge on their killers.

name: Olfamancy
text: Gain enhanced smell. You can identify species, identity, and any injuries of anyone nearby who's left a scent trail within the past few days. You don't know the name or face of anyone you smell, but if you know them from elsewhere, you can match the two.

name: Precognition
text: +3*, +7* vigilance vs sneak attacks. Can only be cast if you haven't cast non-blue magic since your last rest. This can be maintained while asleep, where it lets you wake to react to sneak attacks, with no bonus.

name: Sign
text: Create a unique signature. Every time you produce one, it is the same; everyone else produces a different one. It is obvious if it has been tampered with.

name: Tag, track
text: Tag up to 1* items with a hash of your choosing; you can detect the direction (but not distance) to a tagged item if you know its hash, if it's within 1* times 100m.

name: Telesophy
text: Send messages to anyone on the T-soph network. However, the system is still expensive to use, costing 30c per node used.

name: Umbramancy
text: You and up to 0* allies can see in the dark, treating it as normally lit.

name: Veilbreaker
text: Check MET+vigilance+5* vs a @veil's:veil@ MAS+stealth+$level; on a pass, break any veil nearby (even if you weren't aware of it); on a fail, you can't cast this again today.

name: Watcher
text: Create a Watcher that attaches to an incapacitated target. Once per day, you may share their senses for up to 1* minute. You can do this remotely. They are not typically aware of this. You aren't aware of their thoughts, memories, or other non-sensory data. The Watcher is weak to orange magic and can be killed by any sort of dispel effect, regardless of whether you're targeting it. Per level, you gain an additional sense: audio, video, smell, taste, touch, proprioception, pain, balance, hunger, thermo ... although as long as you have audiovideo you can probably guess at the others. A person may host no more than one Watcher at a time.

name: X-ray vision
text: See through solid objects, up to 1* times 10cm. Specifically, your vision skips ahead up to 10cm from the first opaque object, so if there are two sheets of paper spaced 5cm apart you can see through both, but you can't if they're 15cm apart. In the former case, you're aware of the first piece, like how you can see the palm of a hand you put over one eye.

name: Zoemancy
text: Sense all living creatures within $level metres, even if hidden or inaccessible; but requires a check to penetrate anyone hidden under a @veil@.

name: Attune purple
text: Attune to purple. @Facile@.

name: Bind wisp
text: +4* and +3 ranged vs wisps, and on a hit, you @dominate@ it. However, every 24 hours, they check END+magic vs your MAS+magic; on a pass, they break free and are enraged; on a fail, they get a special +1 magic token with "You only lose 1 of these per day".

name: Compromise
text: Inflict Compromised on an incapacitated target. Once per day, you may take control of them for 1* round. You steal their senses during, and your own body becomes insensate. You otherwise have no additional knowledge about the target. They have no memory of this, and aren't necessarily aware that they're compromised. Lasts indefinitely. You may only have Compromised up to $magic targets at once, and can remove Compromise on any pre-existing target at will.

name: Create curse
text: A magical parasite that infests a victim and inflicts some nuisancesome condition until removed. Curses can be delivered by trap or to any Incapacitated character.

name: Eroarchy
text: Make someone fall in or out of love. Technically only lasts while @channelled@, but people tend to rationalise their love, so it has long-term secondary effect.

name: Hoplarchy
text: Animate target construct and take 5 -1 magic tokens. @Channelled@. The construct may be no larger than you, although you could make a larger one by enchanting multiple components one at a time and joining them together.

name: Hypnoarchy
text: Make someone fall asleep. Take +0*, and on a hit, instead of inflicting N damage, inflict N @fatigue@.

name: Klemarchy
text: @Dominate@ target animate vine.

name: Kyriarchy
text: You become target Rarint's master.

name: Necroarchy
text: Animate up to 1* nearby corpses.

name: Subvert
text: +2*. On a hit, the target takes Subverted ueoc. If they would be incapacitated, instead their focus is fully restored and they are @dominated:dominate@ ueoc. They faint aeoc. If the target is already subverted, this is a @crit@.

name: Summon lesser minion
text: @Summon@ a copy of yourself except that all attributes equal your POW-2; and take 3 -1 magic tokens. It has copies of whatever items you carry, but if it puts them down, they disappear; and consumables don't work, even if it uses them on itself. The minion may be reflavoured.

name: Summon phantasms
text: As for summon lesser minion, except you get 3, its attributes equal your POW, and it can't inflict damage or debuffs or physically affect anything. It can engage enemies; they may choose to ignore it, in which case they aren't interrupted from whatever they were doing, but if they ignore a real attacker, the attacker makes a sneak attack. Its Armour is 0.

name: Summon swarm
text: As for summon lesser minion, except you get 2, each has only 1 focus, and you take only 2 -1 tokens.

name: Umbrage
text: @Summon@ $magic shadowlings randomly around you aeor. A shadowling has all attributes equal to your POW; all skills equal to 5*; and +5 combat. They ignore all commands and are permanently enraged, attacking whoever is closest except other shadowlings. They last ueoc or are dismissed when you are incapacitated. @Unbridled@.

name: Wrath
text: Make other characters attack each other. Enemies with line of sight to you check MAS+magic+20 vs MAS+magic+num_enemies* aeor (single check), and on a fail, take "Enraged: this attacks the nearest non-incapacitated character they are aware of each round. This expires after 3 rounds." Also, anyone engaging you takes -2 MAS ueoc. @Unbridled@.

name: Zoarchy
text: Take +5 to taming checks.
